## User Story

<!-- https://cucumber.io/docs/gherkin/reference/ -->
```gherkin
Feature: As a [persona], I want to [feature], so that [reason]

  Background:
    Given 
    * 
    * 

  Scenario: <scenario-name>
    Given 
    And 
    When 
    Then 
    But 
```
